name: MyFavorito GmbH
description: Developer of a fan-empowered sponsorship platform intended to transform fan love into real money, so everyone wins. The company creates the playing field for sports with a radically different approach to sponsorship, enabling brands and companies that never previously engaged with sports will support thousands of sports clubs simultaneously.
